# Graphing with ggplot

```{r message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)
```

### A basic scatter plot

```{r warning = FALSE}

example_plot <- ggplot(data = penguins, 
                       aes(x = bill_depth_mm,
                           y = bill_length_mm)) +
  geom_point()

example_plot
```
